text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's not gonna work, Kawakami! That<n>tree is more than two
stories tall!<n>Let's go get the custodian.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
You don't need to get my report. I can<n>just rewrite it.
Imagine if you fell and<n>hurt yourself!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Now now, no need to worry! This is<n>no problem for a
princess. Getting up<n>that high'll be a piece of cake!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Here I go!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I wanna be a princess!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: All pretty and sparkly... I'll be adored<n>by all.

text_block_list.name: Young Kawakami
text_block_list.text:
Heeey! Stop picking on the smaller<n>kids or I'll beat the snot
outta ya!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, it's her—the berserk<n>Umamusume! Run before she
starts<n>punchin'!

text_block_list.name: Boy B
text_block_list.text: You're no princess, berserk girl!<n>You're just crazy!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami's Mother
text_block_list.text:
I got a call again about her making<n>another child cry. I don't
understand<n>why she's so aggressive.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami's Father
text_block_list.text:
Well, she wants to be a princess,<n>right? I say we give her
some<n>examples of how a sweet little<n>princess behaves.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Here, look at this. The princess in this<n>book is well-behaved,
isn't she? If<n>you want to become a princess,<n>you'll have
to be nice and quiet like<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Young Kawakami
text_block_list.text:
(Hmph. You don't know anything,<n>Mom. A real princess is
someone just<n>like...)

text_block_list.name: TV Show
text_block_list.text:
"A princess is always beautiful,<n>graceful, and courageous!
I'm the<n>Spitfire Cutie☆Princess Fighter!"

text_block_list.name: Young Kawakami
text_block_list.text:
See?! Even someone like me can be<n>a princess! So I'm
gonna be a<n>princess too—the strongest ever!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
That's right. I'm going to become a<n>princess—one who's
beautiful,<n>graceful, and courageous!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's still my first month as a new<n>trainer at Tracen Academy,
so I decide<n>to take a walk and get a better lay of<n>the land.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hraaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Agh, h-hey! G-get outta the waaay!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A student comes rushing at me like a<n>runaway train. She's
going to crash<n>right into me...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But, amazingly, she pivots at the last<n>moment and kicks off
a wall, leaping<n>straight into the air!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Phew... That was a close one. ♪

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hm? Gaaagh! Th-this is notgood! What did I do?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: You okay, Kawakami—

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Yikes! You made holes all over the<n>wall!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Geez, I tried to stop you. But no, you<n>had to charge right off,
Kawakami!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Uuugh... I didn't mean for this. It's all<n>wrong!
KAWAKAMI!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You've really done it this time with<n>your rampaging,
Kawakami Princess!<n>Look at these giant holes in the<n>
school building—this is unprecedented!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Eep! I'm sorry, it was an accident!<n>But I had a big
reason—bigger than the<n>ocean!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'll hear all about your reasons in the<n>student council office!
Come with me!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Why meee?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Crud! We better follow 'em!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I don't know what's going on, but I<n>decide to find out at the
student<n>council office where Kawakami<n>Princess was
taken.
choice_data_list: So what were you doing back there anyway?
So what were you doing back there anyway?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
My report got stuck in a tree, and<n>Kawakami was trying to
get it for me.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: We said it was dangerous, but she<n>wouldn't listen...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... So the damage inflicted to the<n>wall was not
intentional, and you were<n>merely attempting to help your
friend?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
That's right... I just wanted to get this<n>report down from the
tree...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Scarlet stayed up all night writing it, so<n>it's really important.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
But a stupid breeze snatched it away!<n>I'm a princess—I
couldn't just stand<n>there and do nothing!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Whatever your reason, why did you<n>get so upset that you
had to jump up<n>there? You could've looked for a<n>ladder,
and then none of this<n>would've happened.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
But, well... A real princess doesn't<n>need stuff like that... You
know, like<n>the old saying goes.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: "When you're in a pinch, throw a<n>punch!"

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: That is not a saying! And thisisn't the first time. Just the other day,you—

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hoo boy, she's really gettin' it. It'sawesome that she can't leave afriend hangin', but those holes were majorly bad.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
We should've tried harder to stop<n>her. Though... Kawakami
wouldn't<n>have listened anyway.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: That was rough... Air Groove doesn't<n>pull her punches.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Kawakami! What happened in there?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, you two... I told them it<n>wasn't on purpose.
They said the<n>student council will take care of<n>repairs.
But...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: But what?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
As punishment for giving the council<n>all that extra work, I
have to do chores<n>for them the whole day...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Starting with... taking down all the oldposters in the entire buildiiing!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
So this is Kawakami Princess... She's<n>really
energetic—almost alarmingly so.
